title: Afro Blue Band
text:
Afro Blue Band was an American jazz ensemble who released one album.


== Personnel ==
Arthur Barron
Steve Berrios (drums)
Lionel Cole
Glen Cronkhite
Jerry Gonzalez (trumpet)
Mark Levine   (piano)
Dave Liebman (saxophone)
Mel Martin
Melton Mustafa (trumpet)
Steve Neil
Phoenix Rivera
Hilton Ruiz (piano)
Papo Vasquez
Nicole Yarling


== Discography ==
1995: Impressions (Milestone Records)
